articles.title: Italian presents gift to Secy. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Italian presents gift to Secy. Kim Jong Il

   Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The great leader comrade 
Kim Jong Il received a gift from the secretary general of 
the Italian Institute of International Relations.
   Sec. Gen. Giancarlo Elia Valori on a visit to the DPRK 
handed it to Kim Yong Sun, chairman of the Korean Asia-
Pacific Peace Committee and secretary of the central 
committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Dailies on heinous intention to strangle labor movement
articles.content:
Dailies on heinous intention to strangle labor movement
    Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Papers here today 
criticise the Kim Young Sam fascist clique for their 
appeasement and deception to put down the fighting spirit of 
the South Korean workers.
   The "New Korea Party", a south Korean political party of 
gangsters, held a "Meeting of high-ranking party officials" 
on January 6 and said that it "Would work out laws for 
support of working people" together with the "Government" 
with which to "calm down" The angry workers and that it 
would meet with the hardcore unionists and urge them to 
"Discontinue strikes".
   The analyst of Rodong Sinmun charges that this is one 
more reactionary offensive designed to threaten the workers 
and intensify fascist suppression of them and, at the same 
time, appease them so as to put down their massive struggle 
and enforce the cursed labor laws at any cost.
   The traitorous Kim Young Sam clique seek in the double-
dealing tactics to get rid of the worsening political and 
economic crisis and achieve "Security of power", the 
commentary adds.
   Minju Joson in a commentary says that the Kim Young Sam 
group should not resort to the double-dealing tactics aimed 
at blocking the strikes of the workers calling for the 
withdrawal of the evil laws, but nullify them.

articles.title: Winter sports month begins
articles.content:
Winter sports month begins
   Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A winter sports month 
has begun.
  During the month, organisations of the youth league and 
the children's union at all levels will make sports 
activities, including "Race to Jong Il Peak", skating, 
sleighing and march through a snowy road.
   Youth and students across the country will be able to 
have a strong will and sound physique and fully prepared for 
 labor and national defence through these activities. 
   The opening ceremony was held here on tuesday.

articles.title: Class education hall opened
articles.content:
Class education hall opened 
   Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A class education hall has 
been newly arranged at the People's Palace of Culture in 
Pyongyang.
   It is composed of the anti-american wing, the wing of 
class education principles and the anti-Japanese wing.
   On display in the hall are more than 90 pieces of 
materials for class education.
   The anti-american wing is titled "U.S. Imperialism is the 
sworn enemy of Korean people." 
   pictures showing the matchless grit and valor of the 
respected general Kim Jong Il, who has always led the Korean 
people along the road of victory, determinedly meeting the 
challenges of the U.S. Imperialists, are seen  in the wing.
   Also exhibited are materials showing that the united 
states has been the sworn enemy of the Korean people from 
olden times.
   The wing of class education principles displays famous 
propositions of the great leader President Kim Il Sung and 
general Kim Jong Il and diagrams explaining the essence and 
necessity of class education and its tasks and ways in 
principle.
   On display in the anti-Japanese wing titled "Japanese 
imperialism is the inveterate enemy of the Korean people" 
are a large number of historical evidences of the bestial 
atrocities committed by the Japanese militarists against the 
Korean people.
   In his opening address, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the 
central committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said that 
the newly-built class education hall offers an opportunity 
for the Korean people to harden their determination to 
successfully inherit and accomplish the revolutionary cause 
of juche in defiance of the enemy's manoeuvreings against 
the DPRK and socialism, more tightly holding the weapon of 
the working class.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun berates s. Korean puppets for escalating confrontation with north
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun berates S. Korean puppets for escalating confrontation with north
  Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Kim Young Sam group of 
South Korea let military bosses inspect puppet army posts in 
frontline areas in the demilitarized zone at the beginning 
of the year, crying for "preparedness for combat" and "full 
combat posture". This comes under fire in Rodong sinmun 
today.
   The fact clearly indicates that they are seeking a way 
out of the crisis in unleashing a fratricidal war against 
the north with the backing of outsiders.
   The South Korean puppets, clamouring about the north's 
"possible provocation", have vowed to increase the 
"capacity of landing operation" and the "capacity of 
retaliating on the north".
   Their reckless military moves stem from their serious 
ruling crisis.
   If they provoke a war against the north, we will 
annihilate all of them. We mean what we say.

articles.title: Pres. Kim Il Sung's revolutionary exploits will shine long
articles.content:
Pres. Kim Il Sung's revolutionary exploits will shine long
    Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Whenever I visit Korea, 
the yearning for the great leader president Kim Il Sung 
grows stronger, secretary general Giancarlo Elia Valori of 
the Italian Institute of International Relations said.
   He is the first foreigner to visit Korea this year as he 
was last year.  He said:
   History does not know such a leader as the great 
President Kim Il Sung, who worked for the prosperity of the 
country and the happiness of the people throughout his life.
   He liberated the Korean people from the Japanese 
imperialists' Colonial rule and exalted the dignity of the 
Korean nation.
   His greatest exploit is the foundation of the immortal 
juche idea.
   The idea, whose truth, originality and vitality have been 
proved in practice, is the guiding idea of the workers' 
party of Korea and the Korean people.
   He resolved all the problems arising in the revolutionary 
struggle by moving the minds of the popular massess. 
   The respected general Kim Jong Il is now developing and 
enriching the idea.
   All the Korean people and the whole army are pushing 
ahead with socialist construction with the unshakable faith 
in victory and optimism, rallied close around comrade
supreme commander Kim Jong Il.
   The president's idea and exploits shine long thanks to 
comrade Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: S. Korea rocked by anti-"government" protests
articles.content:
S. Korea rocked by anti-"Government" protests
   Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The massive protests of 
South Korean people including workers which were sparked by 
the railroading of the reactionary "amendment bills on labor 
affairs and the agency for national security planning" have 
further developed into an anti-"Government" struggle.
   The "Korean Confederation of Trade Unions", known as 
Minju Rochong, called a press conference immediately after 
the Kim Young Sam group rammed the evil laws through the 
"National assembly". It declared that it would start 
indefinite general strikes and they would continue until the 
"laws" are repealed.
   Some 5,500 unions under another labor group, the 
"Federation of Korean Trade Unions", have been on general 
strikes against the amendment.
   As of January 7, more than 220,000 workers of 200 unions 
under the umbrella of Minju Rochong were taking part in the 
strikes.
   The Minju Rochong chairman, Kwon Yong Gil,  warned at a 
press conference on tuesday that if the "Government" 
continued a tough policy towards the strikes, Minju Rochong 
would continue the general strikes as scheduled and workers 
of subway and public sector unions would go on strikes 
earlier.
   That day the fascist clique decided to arrest some 30 
leading unionists including kwon Yong gil on charge of their 
"principal role" in the strikes. Angered by this, about 100 
cadres of big business unions throughout South Korea 
categorically rejected the prosecution's first summons, 
vowing to continue the strikes.

articles.title: Human rights violations in s. Korea condemned
articles.content:
Human rights violations in S. Korea condemned
  Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The International 
Committee of Jurists for Democracy and Human Rights in South 
Korea made public an indictment on December 30 disclosing 
human rights violations in South Korea.
   The indictment accused the South Korean authorities of 
cracking down upon the protesters against the revision of 
the "labour law" and beefing up the intelligence agency for 
repression by applying the "national security law".
   It also disclosed the reactionary nature of "democracy" 
advertized by the "civilian government" and human rights 
violations in South Korea.

articles.title: Development of taehongdan county integrated farm
articles.content:
Development of taehongdan county integrated farm
   Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Taehongdan county in 
Ryanggang province is a well-known place, in which a state 
farm of all-people ownership with a county as the unit was 
built for the first time in Korea.
   The county is on the mt. Paektu plateau, more than 1,100 
metres high above sea level, in the northeastern part of the 
mt. Paektu lava ground which is 400 kilometres long from the 
north to the south and 240 kilometres wide from the east to 
the west, around mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the 
revolution. 
   Before the liberation (August 1945), there were only  
thick forest and some patches cultivated by fire-field 
farmers.
   The farm was founded in July 1952 when Korea was in the 
thick of war.
   At that time, the great leader President Kim Il Sung, 
with a far-sighted plan to turn the vast mt. Paektu plateau 
into a fertile area, saw to it that state integrated farm 
no. 5 (the predecessor of the present farm) was founded.
  The president gave on-site guidance to the farm on several 
occasions and gave it highly important teachings hundreds of 
times, so as to indicate the orientation and ways for the 
farm's development in a concrete way.
   Over the past 40 odd years since it was founded, the farm 
has taken on a wonderful look.
   Cultivated area increased to 10,000 hectares and a 1,400 
km-long shelter-belt was made on the farm.
   Wheat, barley, potato, vicia and other crops grow on the 
well-shaped fields.
   All farming processes from ploughing and sowing to 
harvesting and threshing are all mechanized.
   Each farmer is in charge of 30 hectares of arable land.
   Stockbreeding bases and local industrial foundations have 
been built creditably on the farm.
   Modernly-built dwelling houses, schools, hospitals, 
kindergartens and welfare service facilities are seen in 
residential quarters. 
   The farm has built five medium- and small-sized power 
stations on its own. The electric output is more than enough 
to meet the demand of the county.
